#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

typedef int bool;
#define true 1
#define false 0

int main()
{
	int number, row, col, i , j ,k , a[15][15] = {0} , n , count  = 1 ;
	bool colinc = true  , rowinc = false , coldec = false , rowdec = false;
	scanf("%d" , & number);
	if(number % 2 == 0)
	{
		row = number/2 ; 
		col = row - 1 ;
	}
	else
	{ 
	   row = (number - 1)/2 ;
	   col = row;
	}
	
	a[row][col] = 1;
	n = 2 ; 
	for( j = 0 ; j < number-1 ; j++)
	{
		for ( k = 0 ; k < 2 ; k ++ )
		{
			 for ( i = 0 ; i < count ; i++)
		 {
			if( colinc == true)
			{
				col ++ ; 
				a[row][col] = n ;
				n ++;
				
			}
			else if ( rowdec == true)
			{
				row -- ;
				a[row][col] = n;
				n++;
			}
			else if ( coldec == true)
			{
				col -- ;
				a[row][col] = n;
				n++;
			}
			else
			{
				row ++;
				a[row][col] = n;
				n++ ; 
			}
			
		 }
		 
		 if( colinc == true)
		 {
			colinc = false; 
			rowdec = true;
	 	 }
		 else if( rowdec == true)
		 {
			rowdec = false;
			coldec = true;
		 }
		 else if( coldec == true)
		 {
			coldec = false;
			rowinc = true;
		 }
		 else
		 {
			rowinc = false;
			colinc = true;
		 }
		 
		}
	    count ++ ; 
	}
	for( i = 0 ; i < number -1 ; i++)
	{
		if ( number % 2 == 0)
        	col -- ;
        else
            col ++ ;
		a[row][col] = n;
		n++ ; 
	}
	
    for( i = 0 ; i < number ; i++)
    {
    	for (j = 0 ; j < number ; j++)
    	{
    		if (a[i][j] / 10  >=1 )
    		{
    			printf("%d " , a[i][j]);
    		}
    		else
    		{
    			printf("%d  " , a[i][j]);
    		}
    		
    	}
    	
    	printf("\n");
    }
	
	return 0 ;
}
